page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF.......
page.content: Margaret is a housewife in Collier St. "My day starts at 6.30.I get up and feed the 6 cats,prepare a breakfast of toast & cereal and then get my 2 daughters off to school and my husband to Marden for the 7.15 train to London. I go to work at 9.30 until 12.00 at a local farm -apple picking and packing, looking after the stocks(young trees) etc.depending on the time of year.I then come home for lunch.Yesterday I helped transport some old people to a "Hunger Lunch" where you pay an amount and eat a very simple lunch-the money going to a special cause.After work in the afternoon,I prepared the evening meal,mowed the lawn and planted cabbage plants.In the evening there was a church house group followed by a party in somebody's house where paintings were sold and framed.
